content:
I notice that patient.generalPractitioner doesn't have the option to reference PractitionerRole, only Practitioner & Organization. This seems inconsistent with other references to clinicians (e.g., ServiceRequest.practitioner and ServiceRequest.performer) which can reference PractitionerRole.

Should PractitionerRole be added to patient.practitionerRole? (I think it should be...)
I believe a change request was submitted for that. I don't recall the outcome. @Brian Postlethwaite ?
Ok great. I'm currently forward-building my ServiceRequest standard to v4 (looking at v3.2 currently), can I include this with a fair degree of confidence?
